author: Rhys Falby
title: Error With Autograder
question:
I believe there may be an issue with the autograder currently... I am an unsure, so let me know if I am just being dumb. I have gotten my code to 97% and believe there is nothing I can do to reach 100% (once again I could be wrong)
It says that the (@template) tag is incorrect for my next-game function. Even though the template tag is in accordance with the (@signature) which is being graded as correct... So I am not sure how else to form the template tag, so perhaps there is an error with the autograder?
hopefully I do not sound like an idiot
student_answer:
The instructions would have told you to form the function in a specific way. Did you use the template when you made this function? If you didn't use the datatype template, what did you use instead?
